meanings.definition: The chemical processes and substances involved in the functioning of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Understanding neurochemistries helps us comprehend how our brains work.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different neurochemistries to learn more about the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The neurochemistries in our brains are like tiny chefs cooking up thoughts.
meanings.sent4: The intricate neurochemistries of the brain resemble a complex symphony playing within us.
meanings.sent5: Exploring neurochemistries is like unraveling a fascinating mystery in our minds.

meanings.definition: The study of the chemical processes and substances in the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neurochemistries is a fascinating field that delves into the chemistry of the brain.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in neurochemistries aim to uncover the secrets of the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: Studying neurochemistries feels like being a detective investigating the brain's secrets.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of science, neurochemistries act as the guiding stars illuminating brain functions.
meanings.sent5: The world of neurochemistries opens up a realm of possibilities for understanding our minds.
